bike.description: Specialized FSR technology optimized for BRAIN shock, M4 Alloy w/ ORE technology, fully butted and manipulated, full sealed cartridge bearing pivots, disc tabs only, 90mm travel, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Specialized BRAIN shock, manufactured by Fox Racing Shox, air spring and rebound adj., 11.7"  eye to eye, 1.875"  stroke
Manitou Skareb Comp, 80mm travel, air spring, rebound adj., compression lock-out, alloy steerer
1 1/8" Threadless, 3x sealed, black alloy cups, cartridge bearings, ultralight alloy top cap and bolt
Aluminum, 4 bolt, 7 degree rise, black
Specialized XC Low Rise bar, 6066 Alloy, 6 degree upsweep, 8 degree backsweep, 640mm width
Specialized MTB grip, black, double density Kraton
Avid SD-3R cantilevers, cartridge pads, lightweight compressionless housings
Avid SD-3R cantilevers, cartridge pads, lightweight compressionless housings
Avid SD-5, speed dial adjustment
Shimano M-570 LX, 34.9 clamp, bottom pull
Shimano M-750 XT, long cage
Shimano M-570 LX, 9 speed
Shimano HG-50 LX, 11/34
Shimano HG-73
Specialized Strongarm 7050, XT Spline
44Ax32Sx22S, 7050 alloy 4mm thick outer ring, 4 bolt 104/64mm pattern, Steel chainring bolts
Shimano ES-30 Octalink spline, 68mm shell width, 113mm spindle length
Shimano 515 clipless
Mavic X221, 26", black, machined sidewalls, eyelets
Specialized Stout, 28 hole, cartridge bearings, 9mm Skraxle
Shimano M-510, 32 hole, loose ball bearings, upgraded cassette body, alloy Q/R
DT Swiss 1.8mm stainless, black, alloy nipples, 252/252mm front, 262/264mm rear
Specialized Roll-X Pro 2.0", aramid bead, 120 tpi
Specialized Roll-X Pro 2.0", aramid bead, 120 tpi
Specialized Ultralight, presta valve
Specialized Body Geometry technology, hollow Cr-Mo rails

Alloy collar with Q/R, 34.9mm clamp I.D., black
Chain stay/seat stay protector, derailleur protector, seatpost water bottle mount, reflectors, owners manual
